outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management
outputs.output_descr: LECBS Project aims at providing support to the Government of Liberia in its efforts to attract Liberian experts in the public service and initiate a series of major reforms needed to transform and restore the twin attributes of efficiency and integrity.

project_descr: The Liberia Emergency Capacity Building Support (LECBS) project is a response to technical assistance needed in 2006 for a repatriation fund targeting competent policy level professionals to steer reforms for effective service delivery in public sector
project_title: LIBERIA EMERGENCY CAPACITY BUILDING SUPPORT PROJECT
